title: @Riot KateyKhaos I trust you to make this Zyra skin happen!!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/VHLokig.jpg 

Blood Moon Zyra concept by @TomRandby

Reposting this from reddit since I haven't seen it here yet. There are so many skin themes that could work great for Zyra, but I am IN LOVE with this concept!

The mage update can't come soon enough. We need another Zyra skin!!
